alert.note: Alert for Benton; Henry; Weakley (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 18 at 8:44AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Weakley, north central Benton and Henry Counties through 930 AM CDT... At 844 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cottage Grove, or 14 miles west of Paris, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Paris, Paris Landing State Park, Dresden, Cottage Grove, Palmersville, Puryear, Matheny Grove, Ore Springs, Jones Mill, Foundry Hill, Old Springville, Crossland, Como, Buchanan, India, Mill Creek, Osage, Sunnyside, Whitlock and Porter Court. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
